alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Holmes; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 1:03AM CST until December 14 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Holmes County in central Mississippi... Southern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... North central Attala County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 103 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Howard, or 8 miles northeast of Thornton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Lexington around 110 AM CST. Black Hawk and Bowling Green around 125 AM CST. Emory around 130 AM CST. Vaiden around 145 AM CST. Winona around 155 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include West. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
